sentences.sentence: Plug your tabletop lamp into a dimmer instead of the wall socket.
sentences.translation: 直接把你的台灯插到调光器上，而不用插到墙上的插座里。

sentences.sentence: When the lights are dimmer, you'll start going to bed.
sentences.translation: 当灯光变暗时，你就要去睡觉了。

sentences.sentence: If you want to go to bed at 10:30 pm, you might set a timed dimmer switch at 10 pm.
sentences.translation: 如果想晚上10点半睡觉，你可以在晚上十点设置一个定时渐暗开关。
